attributes.action: follow ICC policy on Uganda and sign the Juba peace talk agreement, following up arrest warrants of genocide suspects and the status of executions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although the ICC maintains a policy of not taking position on potential and current situations before the Court or situations under analysis, e mail communications highlight that issues of criminal activities remain outstanding.

Before anymore British subjects are affected by overseas violence, the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to finalise British policy on Uganda and use diplomatic pressures to influence international negotiations for peace.
